name: Conspiracy Theory Game1
description:
Game is incomplete,  built for pc.  its 3 gigs compressed so I  have had to use an external link  to google drive. Itch had a 1gb limit which i was unaware of until it was time to upload.    Here is the link

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1nOrDg62Cwi5cY7gzIqR5ouiyDyBPycrN

submitted before deadline

Here is a video walkthtrough and talk about it.  Age limit 16+ recommended.


At the moment you can hack the main door and explore the building but thats about it.     

 it has some very cool videos from juice media.

Quite proud of the forest, video implementation and the building implementation.

the level itself takes a long time to load and i didnt figure out progress bars in time

Volume control is missing from main scene 

WASD and space to jump,   escape to access in game menu

If you mess up the mini game there is a back door by the kitchen you can jump through.
